/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, form a natural canopy over the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. 

On the left side of the street, power lines crisscross the sky, forming an intricate web against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. These lines, while man-made, do not detract from the natural beauty of the scene but rather add a touch of urbanity to it.

In the distance, a solitary figure can be seen walking on the right side of the street. The person's presence adds a sense of scale to the image, highlighting the vastness of the surrounding greenery and the expanse of the street.

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective to the viewer. It makes the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky.

Overall, the image beautifully encapsulates a typical day on a street in Beijing, blending elements of nature and urban life in a harmonious coexistence.
